title: Cody Simpson hires a security guard after debuting romance with Miley Cyrus
text:
Cody Simpson appears to have increased his security since debuting his romance with Miley Cyrus earlier this month.

Arriving in Sydney Airport on Monday, the 22-year-old songwriter was escorted through the arrivals terminal by a personal bodyguard.

Cody is believed to be in town for the finale of The Masked Singer Australia, which will see him unmasked as The Robot.

Make way! Cody Simpson appears to have increased his security since debuting his romance with Miley Cyrus earlier this month. Pictured with a bodyguard at Sydney Airport on Monday

New couple alert! Since debuting their relationship earlier this month, Cody and Miley have been sharing endless loved-up photos to Instagram

The security guard, who was dressed in all black, looked stern and vigilant as he kept close to Cody upon his arrival.

Since debuting their relationship earlier this month, Cody and Miley have been sharing endless loved-up photos to Instagram.

But when asked to comment on his new girlfriend, the Pretty Brown Eyes hitmaker refused to speak to paparazzi and only offered a cheeky grin.

Keeping a watchful eye: The security guard, who was dressed in all black, looked stern and vigilant as he kept close to Cody upon his arrival

As far back as 2009, years before they even met, Cody had professed his admiration for Miley on Twitter. He later admitted she was his 'first celebrity crush'.

The pair became friends in 2014 when Cody was dating American model Gigi Hadid.

They went public with their romance on October 4, just two months after Miley announced her separation from husband Liam Hemsworth.

They go way back! The couple first became friends in 2014 when Cody was dating American model Gigi Hadid. Pictured: Miley and Cody in 2015

Over the weekend, Cody released a romantic ballad inspired by his girlfriend, titled Golden Thing.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia on October 12, Cody's sister Ali Simpson said of the new couple: 'They're very happy and very in love. It's very new, but they have history.'

Contestants on The Masked Singer participate in media interviews the morning after being unmasked, which perhaps explains Cody's visit to Sydney.

'They're very happy and very in love': They went public with their romance on October 4, just two months after Miley announced her separation from husband Liam Hemsworth

Last week, Cody (as the Robot) performed a mash-up of two of Miley's hits: Nothing Breaks Like a Heart and Jolene, which was originally recorded by Miley's godmother, Dolly Parton.

Cody was last in Australia in July, which happened to be when the program was being filmed at Sydney's Fox Studios.

The Masked Singer Australia finale airs Monday at 7.30pm on Channel 10

authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
